metadata.title: Japanese Sumo wrestler tshirt Japan anime t-shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester

Japan is the land of sumo, where sumo wrestlers have been participating in this ancient traditional Japanese sport for thousands of years. As a mainstay of Japanese culture and sports, as well as Japanese entertainment, Japan is fixated on these stars.

Sumo is also popular all around the world, with fans interested in Japanese culture and lifestyle, media, sports, etc. This tee shows the sumo's power and grace and skill in a ring. The level of athleticism is high and unmatched. Get this apparel now.
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: We are the preeminent design company focused on culture, art, entertainment related themes in Japan. We produce classic and contemporary designs for you to enjoy!
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "10 x 8 x 1 inches; 4.8 Ounces", "Department": "womens", "Date First Available": "June 13, 2017", "Manufacturer": "Japanese sumo samurai kendo"}
